comment._content: Nasty Photo of the German.   Look at the faces of the other men below him.   They were not happy.   Finally Norway Put an end to the brutality and the invasion of the Nazi.    What those dirty Nazi did to their Russian Prisoners were Horrible.    The Blood road tells just some of the Cruel things the Gemans did to the Human race.  Damn what they did.
